description: Monitors Openshift/k8s cluster using Prometheus. Shows overall cluster CPU / Memory / Filesystem usage as well as individual pod, containers, systemd services statistics. Uses cAdvisor metrics only.

alert.message: One or more Master servers exceeded 4 CPU cores
alert.name: Master - CPU usage by host alert

alert.message: One or more Registry servers exceeded 4 CPU cores
alert.name: Registry - CPU usage by host alert

alert.message: One or more Infra servers exceeded 4 CPU cores
alert.name: Infra - CPU usage by host alert

alert.message: One or more App servers exceeded 50 CPU cores
alert.name: App - CPU usage by host alert
App - CPU usage by Pod|Container alert

alert.message: One or more master nodes exceeds memory usage of 10GB/node
alert.name: Master - Memory usage alert

alert.message: One or more registry nodes exceeds memory usage of 10GB/node
alert.name: Registry - Memory usage alert

alert.message: One or more infra nodes exceeds memory usage of 18GB/node
alert.name: Infra - Memory usage alert

alert.message: One or more app nodes exceeds memory usage of 200GB/node
alert.name: App - Memory usage alert
App - Memory usage by pod:container alert

alert.message: One or more master nodes exceeds root file system usage of 50GB/node
alert.name: Master - Root volume file system alert

alert.message: One or more registry nodes exceeds root file system usage of 30GB/node
alert.name: Registry - Root volume file system alert

alert.message: One or more infra nodes exceeds root file system usage of 30GB/node
alert.name: Infra - Root volume file system alert

alert.message: One or more app nodes exceeds root file system usage of 40GB/node
alert.name: App - Root volume file system alert

title: Openshift cluster
